participant_abstract.sent: M.
The kick-off meeting went well.
There were four of us present- Heather, the Project Manager; Tara, the Interface Designer; Poppy, the Industrial Designer; and myself, Genevieve, the Marketing Expert.
We began by introducing ourselves and outlining our roles in the product design.
Heather went on to brief us on the purpose and agenda of the meeting.
We learned that we are to go through the functional, conceptual and detailed design of a remote control.
This remote is to be original, trendy and user-friendly.
After this introduction, Heather asked each of us to draw a picture of our favourite animal, explaining our reasons.
(Elk, Cat, Dog and Butterfly).
After the animal fun we went on to discuss the finance issues of our product: -sell for 25 euros.
Profit aim of 50 million euros.
Production cost of 12.50 euros.
International marketing.
The group did some remote control brainstorming: -original design.
Buttons should be user friendly and easy to use in the dark.
Remotes are often lost- some sort of tracking device?
Should be universal considering our international market (but maintain uniqueness).
After this, Heather outlined some of the research that needs to be done before our next meeting.
I will be looking at user requirement specifications.
The meeting concluded at 11:17am.
